package.name: kuka_resources

description.p: This package, originally created by G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute),initially contained common urdf / xacro resources used by KUKA robot support packages within the ROS-Industrial program.
It has since been modified by the maintainer, Lenny Ng'ang'a, to support ROS2.

package.author: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
